Description: Up for auction is a left handed Schecter Omen 6 solid body electric guitar in gloss black. The guitar has been modified to accommodate a right handed player and can easily be restrung to function as designed. Normal signs of use with some minor cosmetic flaws. The neck is straight and the frets are in very good shape. Lot's of life left in this instrument. Let's Rock!! ReturnsAlways a 30 day return policy. Title: Schecter Omen 6 Diamond Series Electric Guitar- LEFT HANDED - Gloss Black

NameValueList.Name: Modification Description
Value: Left handed design restrung to accommodate a right handed player.

ConditionDescription: This is a left handed guitar that has been re-strung for a right-handed player.  It can easily be restrung to function as a lefty as designed.  Some noticeable chips in the finish on the front and back of the body; the back of the body has a skull sticker as shown in the photos, that could be removed if desired; a few other small scratches and nicks that stand out as shown in the photos.  There is slight play of the input jack.
